caller_intent: The caller is seeking clarification on a discrepancy between her calculated insurance premium ($479) and the amounts quoted by an agent ($542.20) and the system ($547.60) after removing a vehicle from her policy.
resolution_steps: Agent Rhonda Murphy confirms the caller's policy details (three vehicles initially, now two after removing the Jaguar).
Explains that rate increases from October 2023 are now reflected in the renewal premium.
Clarifies the pro-rated credit for removing the Jaguar ($10.70) and the loss of multi-car discounts.
Breaks down the individual vehicle premiums (Jeep Wrangler: $164.23, Honda truck: $283.37) and additional fees (uninsured motorists: $85).
Resolves the discrepancy by noting the $542.20 figure applies if paid in full, aligning with the caller's expectation.
knowledge_required: Impact of rate changes on premiums
Policy breakdown components (vehicle premiums, uninsured motorists fees)
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance Services policy management system
summary: The caller was confused about a $68 discrepancy in her insurance premium after removing a vehicle. The agent explained that rate increases, loss of multi-car discounts, and pro-rated credits contributed to the difference. By breaking down the policy into individual components, the agent clarified that the $542.20 figure (for full payment) matched the caller's expectation.
